data.text:
Polycom SpectraLink 8030 Description:

The Polycom SpectraLink 8030 VoIP phone is an IP based wireless phone. Cut the cord with these unique wireless Polycom phones. These phones operate on the IEEE 802.11b/g/a Wi-Fi radio signal.

The SpecrtraLink 8030 (MPN: 2200-37167-001) offers a unique push-to-talk function that mimics what most radios can do. The push to talk function on these wireless VoIP phones bypass the PBX system, increasing speed and reliability of communication.

The Polycom SpectraLink 8030 features an improved and enlarged earpiece that helps block background noise and increase the ergonomics of the device.

Polycom SpectraLink 2200-37167-001 Features:

Connection: RJ-45, IP / VoIP

4 Softkeys

Headset Jack

Push to Talk Capabilities

Radio Frequencies: IEEE 802.11b/g/a Wi-Fi radio

Backlit keypad

Predial and Redial

Speakerphone Functionality

Capability to Store 20 User-Defined Numbers

Ability to assign 10 Speed-Dial Keys

Configuration Menu to Define User Preferences

5 User Profiles for Ring Behavior

Compatibility:

Only with SpectraLink Certified Access Points

Includes:
